metadata.title: USN-5220-1 -- Composer vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Composer did not properly sanitize URLs for Mercurial repositories in the root composer.json and package source download URLs. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5220-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  composer - 1.10.1-1ubuntu0.1~esm1 Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
